::Slayer::

Slayer growls at Megaton, knowing that he'd probably have to fight 
this bot.

"A Predacon saving the Maximals? How pathetic." He says, watching 
Megaton carefully.




--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Megaton scanned through the files he'd read at the predacon base to 
find a
> match. When he did it didn't make sense. The predacon files listed 
this bot
> as Striker Maximal combat leader.
> 
> "You must be a brave bot challengeing an entire ship with your toy 
missles."
> The dragon complimented Slayer when the transmetal bot stepped into 
view.
> 
> He looked around again noticing that there were no other bots in 
the area.
> "Let me rephrase that" he began again "You must be a fool to come 
here with
> your little friend." He lowered his head to Slayers level blowing a 
puff of
> smoke in the smaller bots face. "My only challenge is to decide who 
to eat
> first."
